anya-e1001n5:2_0: Mahājanaṁ yo rañjeti, catūhipi vatthūhi vā;
anya-e1001n5:3_0: Rājāti vuccate loke, iti sallakkhaye vidvā.
anya-e1001n5:8_0: Kariyacariyasusaṅgahaṁ bahūnaṁ, anavamatena guṇena yāti saggaṁ;
anya-e1001n5:9_0: Dānañca peyyavajjañca, atthacariyā ca yā idha;
anya-e1001n5:10_0: Samānattatā ca dhammesu, tattha tattha yathārahaṁ;
anya-e1001n5:11_0: Ete kho saṅgahā loke, rathassāṇīva yāyato.
anya-e1001n5:13_0: Dānaṁ sīlaṁ pariccāgaṁ, ajjavaṁ maddavaṁ tapaṁ;
anya-e1001n5:17_0: Ekayāmaṁ saye rājā, dviyā maññeva paṇḍito;
anya-e1001n5:20_0: Aputtakaṁ gharaṁ suññaṁ, raṭṭhaṁ suññaṁ arājakaṁ;
anya-e1001n5:27_0: Dubbalassa balaṁ rājā, kumārānaṁ rudaṁ balaṁ.
anya-e1001n5:30_0: Nāyakassa guṇā ete, icchitabbā sataṁ sadā.
anya-e1001n5:33_0: Sakiṁ sappurisā loke, esa dhammo sanantano.
anya-e1001n5:38_0: Yo paṇḍito kodhano taṁ na sādhu.
anya-e1001n5:40_0: Āyaṁ khayaṁ sayaṁ jaññā, katākataṁ sayaṁ jaññā;
anya-e1001n5:43_0: Mātā puttakataṁ pāpaṁ, sissakataṁ guru tathā;
anya-e1001n5:46_0: Akkodhena jine kodhaṁ, asādhuṁ sādhunā jine;
anya-e1001n5:57_0: Na raññā samakaṁ bhuñje, kāmabhogaṁ kudācanaṁ;
anya-e1001n5:61_0: Na me rājā sakhā hoti, na rājā hoti samako;
anya-e1001n5:62_0: Eso sāmiko mayhanti, citte niṭṭhaṁ saṇṭhāpaye.
anya-e1001n5:65_0: Ujuke nātininne ca, na bhaje uccamāsane;
anya-e1001n5:66_0: Cha dose vajje sevako, aggīva saṁyato tiṭṭhe.
anya-e1001n5:67_0: Na pacchato na purato, nāpi āsannadūrato;
anya-e1001n5:68_0: Na kacche nopi paṭivāte, na cāpi oṇatuṇṇate;
anya-e1001n5:69_0: Ime dose vivajjetvā, ekamantaṁ ṭhitā ahu –
anya-e1001n5:76_0: Kassako vāṇijo macco, samaṇo sutasīla vā;
anya-e1001n5:82_0: Mahārukkhassa phalino, āmaṁ chindati yo phalaṁ;
anya-e1001n5:88_0: Mahārukkhassa phalino, pakkaṁ chindati yo phalaṁ;
